item.description:
Title: TCG Card Shop Simulator
Genre: Simulation , Early Access
Developer: OPNeon Games
Publisher: OPNeon Games
Release Date: Sep 15, 2024
Early Access Release Date: Sep 15, 2024




About This Game

TCG Card Shop Simulator is a trading card shop simulation where you sell card booster packs to earn money and build your card shop business.



Manage Your Shop:
Design your own TCG shop. Organize shelves and card packs to make customer shopping experience smooth and easy.



Card Collection:
Open the booster packs yourself and collect the cards. Find rare cards and sell them to make a fortune, or keep them to complete your card collection.



Host Game:
Set your card game format and fee, invite players to play card games in your shop. Be sure to keep your store clean and hygienic for the players or they might leave!



Order Products:
Stock up on different booster card packs and card game products. Keep track of popular trends and adjust your inventory to cater to the ever-changing demands of your customers.



Expand Your Business:
Earn profits to reinvest in your shop. Expand your space, unlock new card sets, and upgrade your facilities to attract even more customers and increase revenue.

item.title: ELDORANTE
item.description:
Title: ELDORANTE
Genre: Adventure , Indie , RPG
Developer: MOON KNIGHT SPARKLE
Publisher: Kagura Games
Franchise: Kagura Games
Release Date: Sep 13, 2024




About This Game




Makane, an arms merchant, rides a ship crossing the sea between two major continents when it meets with misfortune. The Sea God has riled up the oceans, and everyone aboard ends up shipwrecked on the island of Grimt!

Luckily, the people of Grimt are kind and willing to point the now-penniless merchant to the island's main attraction, the Dungeon. Legend says that the golden land of Eldorante, filled with infinite wealth, sleeps at the bottom of the Dungeon, but the last time anyone ever reached it was before the city of Grimt was founded.

Of course, that doesn't mean nobody else is trying... Makane soon runs into the prince of a foreign empire who seeks to claim the golden land and its treasures for his homeland. It's an action-packed race to reach Eldorante!


Eldorante is a roguelite game with many Dungeon sections to explore. You can fight enemies in turn-based RPG combat, or avoid them to keep your level low and get better clear rewards when you beat the boss of the section you're delving into. Whether you get defeated or defeat the boss, leaving the Dungeon sets your level back to 1, but you get to keep everything you've found along the way.

Power up with new equipment, extract skills as gems to equip, cook and eat meals, and recruit numerous partners to choose from for a leg up on subsequent delves!

And if you feel like helping out the residents of Grimt, you'll find a cast of kooky characters who want all sorts of items.









A Roguelite Experience
Delve the Dungeon, gathering loot and allies as you progress to aid you in your challenge as you start every foray at level 1.

Turn-Based Combat
Strategize who to bring and how to use your skills to claim victory in turn-based RPG battles.

Levels or Loot?
You can fight enemies to gain levels during your Dungeon delves, but you can get better loot by beating bosses at lower levels. Will you challenge yourself?

Farm to Table
You can visit the pasture to plant crops that will grow as in-game time progresses, then use those crops to make food to give yourself an edge in combat.

Sidequests Galore
Many residents of Grimt want something from the Dungeon, and you're their only hope of getting it!

item.title: Pyrene
item.description:
Title: Pyrene
Genre: Indie , Strategy
Developer: Two Tiny Dice
Publisher: Indie Asylum
Release Date: Sep 13, 2024




About This Game




Join forces with your villagers to battle the malevolent Demon Herensuge and his army of hellish minions & elites, intent on wreaking havoc on your serene homeland. Use your deck-building skills to emerge victorious from the perilous depths of the Pyrenees.



Experiment with various characters each with distinct abilities and traits that enable a wide range of gameplay styles. Develop different strategies and optimize the use of items you collect to enhance your abilities on every adventure.



Upgrade your deck by unlocking over 200 powerful relics and 100+ cards that you can switch on-the-fly to maximize your deck in between enemy encounters.



Fight through distinct biomes such as dark caverns, corrupted swamps, menacing mountains, each with their own set of creatures and terrain modifiers.
Between expeditions, return to your village and restore buildings to unlock upgrades for your items and spells .





  • Uncharted Setting: Pyrene is based on Basque mythology, a never-before seen pantheon in video games. Learn more about these untold stories, deities and creatures by playing.
  • Strategic Decision-Making: Balanced between ease of play and strategy, Pyrene presents deep deck-building elements that intertwine with its dungeon-crawling gameplay to force you to think before making any move.
  • Unique Characters: Play as a diverse cast of characters from your village, each one possessing unique skills, mechanics and magic. Tailor your deck to your hero to make the most of each run!
  • Built for Replayability: With a wide range of objects, biomes, relics, talismans & spells, no two runs are the same and you will be able to develop ingenuous strategies to navigate the game’s story and endless modes YOUR way.

item.title: Edge of Sanity
item.description:
Title: Edge of Sanity
Genre: Action , Indie
Developer: Vixa Games
Publisher: Daedalic Entertainment
Franchise: Daedalic Entertainment
Release Date: Sep 13, 2024




About This Game

  • Psychological horror inspired by the Cthulhu-Mythos in a hand-crafted 2D art style
  • Narrative driven, featuring an uncanny atmosphere and sinister story
  • Explore remote areas to find other survivors and scavenge for basic supplies
  • Manage the survivor’s camp to ensure survival and prepare for expeditions
  • Pick your fights wisely… or things might go from bad to worse within moments

Edge of Sanity is a psychological survival horror game set in the unforgiving wilderness of Alaska featuring hand-crafted 2D art and intense atmosphere inspired by the Cthulhu Mythos.

You were part of a resupply team helping scientists working in the Alaskan field lab. Finding the site devoid of humanity, you stumble upon horrifying creatures and during the escape your group splits up. You barely made it out alive and managed to set up a provisional camp. It’s time to get to the bottom of what happened.

Explore hostile caves, forgotten mines and hidden laboratories in search of precious resources for you and other survivors. Look for clues to uncover the dark secrets of the mysterious PRISM organization and unveil the real story behind their experiments.

Each day in this remote area is a tough fight for survival. Limited food and supplies, and your sanity being stretched to the edge. Be prepared to improvise and look for any advantage you might have against various monstrosities. It’s all up to you whether the darkness fully consumes you or you manage to cling on to what remains of your sanity.



Madness affecting every game aspect
Each dramatic event during your traverse across Alaska leaves a permanent scar on your mind. Accumulating madness results in acquiring traumas, affecting your characters’ actions and sense of reality, opening new dialogue options, and enabling you to craft entirely new items.



Manage your crew’s morale
Even in the most hostile environment, you need a place to rest and plan your future expeditions. Find and assign remaining survivors, and send them out on scouting missions and build stations to produce food, water, and other resources. But don’t let your guard down - with people being on the edge, anything can happen.



Multiple ways of approaching the fight
Learn your enemy’s weaknesses, impair their senses, manage resources and make use of crafting abilities and the surroundings to survive against various monstrosities. Whenever you are out of options, you can try fighting using your axe… but be prepared for a lethal outcome.



Difficult choices and intense atmosphere
Uncover the dark deeds of local cults, face horrific monsters and explore the unexplainable. Welcome to Alaska during the Cold War, full of people losing their sanity and beasts inspired by the Cthulhu Mythos, a place where the line between good and evil choices and deeds is blurred.

item.title: Nocturnals
item.description:
Title: Nocturnals
Genre: Adventure , Indie
Developer: Cowboy Toad Games
Publisher: Cowboy Toad Games
Release Date: Sep 13, 2024




About This Game



This game was created as my version of a love letter to my partner.

Follow the story of Ted as he navigates the abandoned town of Ruddleside amidst the post apocalypse, finding a solitary companion in Diego.

Your choices determine whether Diego will bond with Ted and help him continue his search for surviving communities, or whether the pair will face difficulties and challenges that put them at odds with each other whilst trying to escape the horrors within Ruddleside.

Gameplay:
  • Explore Stylized 3D Environments: Navigate the atmospheric setting of Ruddleside.
  • Solve Puzzles and Find Collectibles: Uncover the town's mysteries through various puzzles and collectibles.
  • Shape Ted's Destiny: Make decisions that influence Ted's personality and determine his fate.

Embark on a heartfelt journey in Nocturnals, coming 2024.
